title: Anthropic acquires computer-use AI startup Vercept after Meta poached one of its founders
author: Julie Bort
content: Seattle-based Vercept developed complex agentic tools, including a computer-use agent that could complete tasks inside applications like a person with a laptop would.

aiAnalysis.summary: Anthropic acquires Vercept, a Seattle-based startup building computer-use AI agents, following Meta's recruitment of one of Vercept's founders. The acquisition strengthens Anthropic's agentic AI capabilities.
keyPoints: Anthropic acquires AI agent startup Vercept
Vercept developed computer-use agents for application automation
Acquisition follows Meta poaching Vercept co-founder
Strategic move to enhance Claude's agentic capabilities
